title: Kimi ni, Meromero
sinopse:
A collection of oneshots about unusual couples: including one that comes together through the uke's love of late-night flashing, crossdressing and lacy undergarments

• Motto Boku Wo

• Ureeru Don Quixoute
Hijiri and Kunihiro are in love and dating, but Hijiri is starting to worry that their relationship is just a sexual one. All of their dates end in the same way, with sex in public places! Maybe if Kunihiro was jealous Hijiro could find out how he really feels..
(Source: DokiDoki)
